body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Create a new duel
2. Load deck Fallen_Knights_60.dec

What is the expected output?
The deck should be loaded or a warning should issued if the files is
corrupted.

What do you see instead?
Magarena crashes with java.lang.NumberFormatException What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.25 If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below. The deck file is missing a the comment symbol (>) in the last line.
author: [pablo.ca...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/100883785716832971309/)
title: Fallen_Knights_60.dec crash with NumberFormatException

comments.body: I forgot to mention. I am running Ubuntu 12.04 with OpenJDK 1.6.0 update 24
comments.author: [pablo.ca...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/100883785716832971309/)

comments.body:
Thanks for reporting! The dec file was missing the '>' to indicate the start of a comment. I've just fixed that, going forward we will make the procedure for loading decks more robust.

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
